alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; South Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 8:19PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Walton County through 800 PM CDT... At 718 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of wind gusts up to 50 mph over Lake Lorraine, moving northeast at 20 mph. Waterspouts are also possible over Choctawhatchee Bay. HAZARD...Waterspouts and wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Waterspouts can easily overturn boats and create locally hazardous waters. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Santa Rosa Beach, Eglin Air Force Base, Portland, Villa Tasso, Gulf Pines, Grayton Beach, Blue Mountain Beach, Sandestin, Miramar Beach and Four Mile Village. WATERSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
